User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1) Gecko/20061010 Firefox/2.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1) Gecko/20061010 Firefox/2.0 Previewed and printed page look different than the page when viewed in the browser window. Many of the cell borders are either missing or appear in the wrong place. The text "Suppressed Fires(Type 1)" is printed in the wrong place. Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: 1. Save the html code in the Additional Information block into a html file. 2. View the file with FireFox 3. Select File - Print Preview 4. Compare the Browser view to Print Preview sstillin: Fire Reporting - Summary - Number of Fires and Acres Burned by Fire Type by Year
Fire Reporting Home Page | Help | Help on Summary | Summaries | User Preferences | Logoff | Support

Fire Reporting - Summary: Number of Fires and Acres Burned by Fire Type by Year

Summary Number of Fires and Acres Burned by Fire Type by Year
DescriptionSummarizes by year (calendar or fiscal) the number of fires and the acres burned (bureau acres and total control acres) per fire/protection type.
Selection Criteria
Pre-defined
  • None
Selection Criteria
User-defined
  • BIA - All Regions - All Reporting Units
  • Fire Cause Natural, Human and not specified
  • Complete fire reports only
  • Calendar Year 2003 through 2005
  • All Fire Type/Protection Types

comments.author: keith_mcgillivary@blm.gov
comments.creator: keith_mcgillivary@blm.gov

comments.raw_text:
I'm going to mark this bug invalid for two reasons.  First is that the test case needs to be in as an attachment, this post is WAY to long, second is that it's almost definitely a collection of the many printing and print preview bugs posted, but is so broad that it will be impossible to narrow down what the issue is.

SO! my recommendation is to try to figure out how each of the errors is caused, find a test case that causes it, and then post that test case as an attachment in a new bug.
comments.author: aconbere@gmail.com
comments.creator: aconbere@gmail.com
comments.text:
I'm going to mark this bug invalid for two reasons.  First is that the test case needs to be in as an attachment, this post is WAY to long, second is that it's almost definitely a collection of the many printing and print preview bugs posted, but is so broad that it will be impossible to narrow down what the issue is.

SO! my recommendation is to try to figure out how each of the errors is caused, find a test case that causes it, and then post that test case as an attachment in a new bug.

comments.raw_text:
for an example of the pre-existing printing bugs, (and there are a ton) check this bugzilla query.

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?query_format=specific&order=relevance+desc&bug_status=__open__&content=print+preview

~ Anders
